wikipedia_page.main: Albert Charles Smith (1905 – unknown) was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Drumoyne.  He played for Petershill, Northampton Town, and Manchester United.

response: * Albert Smith (Maine politician) (1793–1867), member of U.S. House of Representatives from Maine
